in Newport News  men were charged Friday with soliciting prostitution in a sting by the Newport News Police Department PERIOD Included in the group was Virginia Tech Hall of Fame quarterback Maurice DeShazo PERIOD The arrests were conducted as part of the Cook County Ill PERIOD Sherriffs Office National Day of Johns Arrests a day when police departments crack down on solicitors of prostitutes nationwide PERIOD
